name: The Adventure Of Sap
description:
This is my first ever project! :)

The adventure of sap is released and its ready to be played!

STORY:

-You are a SAP , you fall into a dark cave and don't know what's ahead but that doesn't stop you from moving forward and trying to escape , as you progress the cave becomes more dangerous as if the cave itself doesn't want you to leave more slimes and obstacles show up!

-Press on the "help" button in the main menu to know the controls!

extra:

-Sadly my game will no longer be playable on browser and you should download it!

-The download size for the ZIP file in "164 mb".

-The Adventure Of Sap will no longer be in development  The game will receive small updates to fix any reported bug or glitch in the game!

-I had too many ideas and I promised alot of things but I made a little bit of  what I promised sadly because I was going too big with the ideas I had to cancel alot of them because I'm still new and still learning!
